applyBorrowInterest(uint256,address,uint.details: how much interest has accrued to a borrowed balance over time

buyBond(address,uint256,uint256,uint256).details: buy fixed term bond that does not renew

payOff(address,uint256).details: gets called by router if loan is extinguished

registerBorrow(address,uint256).details: gets called by router to register if a trader borrows issuers

viewAccumulatedBorrowingYieldFP(address).details: get the borrow yield for a specific issuer/token

viewBorrowAPRPer10k(address).details: get current borrowing interest per 10k for a token / issuer

viewHourlyBondAPRPer10k(address).details: get current lending APR per 10k for a token / issuer

viewWithBorrowInterest(uint256,address,u.details: view function to get balance with borrowing interest applied

withdrawBond(uint256).details: send back funds of bond after maturity

bondIds.details: IDs for all bonds held by an address

devdoc.title: Manage lending for a variety of bond issuers

activateIssuer(address).notice: Make a issuer available for protocol

activateIssuer(address,address).notice: Make issuer != token available for protocol (isol. margin)

closeHourlyBondAccount(address).notice: Shut down hourly bond account for `issuer`

deactivateIssuer(address).notice: Remove a issuer from trading availability

haircuts(address).notice: In case of shortfall, adjust debt

issuerTokens(address).notice: mapping issuers to tokens (in crossmargin, the issuers are tokens  themselves)

setHourlyYieldAPR(address,uint256).notice: Set hourly yield APR for issuer

setMaxHourlyYieldFP(uint256).notice: Set maximum hourly yield in floating point

setRuntimeWeights(address,uint256[]).notice: Set runtime weights in floating point

setRuntimeYieldsFP(address,uint256[]).notice: Set runtime yields in floating point

setYieldChangePerSecondFP(uint256).notice: Set yield change per second in floating point

viewBondReturn(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Get view of returns on bond
